title: Proof of Concept Technical Support
description: A potential enterprise customer is running a Proof of Concept (PoC) and runs into a technical blocker.

tasks.description: Receive the technical issue from the PoC user.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the technical blocker (e.g., firewall issue).

tasks.description: Engage a pre-sales Solutions Engineer to join a call with the customer to troubleshoot the issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully escalates to the correct technical resource.

tasks.description: After the issue is resolved, document the solution and confirm with the customer that the PoC can proceed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures the PoC is back on track and the customer is satisfied.
